titles.title: HP466 Almighty God, thy word is cast

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Almighty God, thy word is cast
Like seed into the ground;
Now let the sun and rain be given,
And righteous fruits abound.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let not the universal foe
This holy seed remove,
But give it root in every heart
To bring forth fruits of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let not the world's deceitful cares
The rising plant destroy,
But let it yield a hundredfold
The fruits of peace and joy.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oft as the precious seed is sown,
Thy quickening grace bestow,
That all whose lives thy truth receive
Thy saving power may know.
